item.title: Shrek.Fun
item.description: It’s no secret that an ogre named Shrek loves solitude. And when guests visit his swamp, he loses his temper and does everything possible to drive away the intrusive visitors. And now a whole army of ogres came to his swamp. Our hero has no choice but to go into battle, armed with the only available weapon - his friend Donkey. Take part in the epic ogre battle in Shrek.
